title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Xue Bing

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience H.E. Xue Bing, China’s Special Envoy of the Horn of Africa Affairs today, 22nd April, 2024.
The meeting held on the sidelines of the High Level African Counter-Terrorism Meeting holding in Abuja from 22nd to 23rd April, 2024.
Discussions centered on strengthening the partnership between Nigeria and China in all areas of mutual interests.
